special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Kalmatar, the Hungering Maw, untap each Forest you control.
[+2]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.
[-2]: Sacrifice another permanent. Draw cards equal to that permanent’s converted mana cost.
[-9]: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
